TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SubMenuStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style implements class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor
Public Class SubMenuStyle Inherits Style Implements ICustomTypeDescriptor
type SubMenuStyle = class inherit Style interface ICustomTypeDescriptor

summary.span: 表示 控件中子菜单的样式。

span.span: Represents the style of a submenu in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类来表示中子菜单的样式控件。Use the class to represent the style of a submenu in the control. 可以在静态菜单或动态菜单中显示子菜单。A submenu can be displayed within either a static menu or a dynamic menu. 静态菜单始终是可见上控制，而仅当用户将鼠标指针定位在父菜单项包含动态子菜单时，将显示一个动态菜单。A static menu is always visible on a control, whereas a dynamic menu is displayed only when the user positions the mouse pointer over a parent menu item that contains a dynamic submenu. 使用下表中的属性，可以指定不同的样式特征 （如字体大小和颜色） 的静态菜单和动态菜单中子菜单。You can specify different style characteristics (such as font size and color) for the submenus within a static menu and a dynamic menu by using the properties in the following table. |子菜单项样式属性Submenu item style property|描述Description| |---------------------------------|-----------------| ||动态菜单中子菜单的样式设置。The style settings for a submenu within a dynamic menu.| ||对于静态菜单中子菜单样式设置。The style settings for a submenu within a static menu.| 类继承其大多数成员从`Style`类。The class inherits most of its members from the `Style` class. 它扩展`Style`类通过提供控制菜单项的文本周围的空间量的属性。It extends the `Style` class by providing properties that control the amount of space around a menu item's text. 使用属性来控制量空间左侧和右侧的菜单项的文本。Use the property to control the amount of space to the left and right of the menu item's text. 同样，属性控制菜单项的文本和下方的更高版本的空间量。Similarly, the property controls the amount of space above and below the menu item's text. 有关继承的样式设置的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on the inherited style settings, see . > [!NOTE] > 设置`z-index`通过设置子菜单与关联的 HTML 对象的子菜单样式的属性。Set the `z-index` of HTML objects that are associated with a submenu by setting the property of the submenu style. `z-index`属性定义呈现的 HTML 对象的堆叠顺序。The `z-index` attribute defines the stacking order of rendered HTML objects. 默认情况下，将具有默认 z-索引 (0) 的任何 HTML 对象上方显示动态菜单项。By default, dynamic menu items will appear above any HTML object that has the default z-index (0). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定动态菜单中子菜单的自定义样式。The following example demonstrates how to specify a custom style for a submenu within a dynamic menu. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDynamicMenuStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicMenuStyle/CS/menudynamicmenustylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDynamicMenuStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicMenuStyle/VB/menudynamicmenustylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建的新实例类。Use this constructor to create a new instance of the class. 此构造函数通常用于动态填充集合。This constructor is commonly used when dynamically populating the collection. 它还用来扩展类，以初始化子菜单项样式属性，如或。It is also used when extending the class to initialize the submenu item style properties, such as or .

param.span: 当前请求的视图状态信息。

summary.span: 用指定的视图状态信息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified view-state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建一个新对象包含在请求的视图状态的信息。Use this constructor to create a new object with the information contained in the request's view state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CopyFrom(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style s) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub CopyFrom (s As Style)

span.span: The object to copy.

summary.span: 将指定的 对象的样式属性复制到 类的当前实例中。

span.span: Copies the style properties of the specified object into the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法指定的样式属性复制对象中调用此方法的对象。Use the method to duplicate the style properties of the specified object in the object that calls this method. > [!CAUTION] > 中的当前实例的所有属性类将被替换的相应属性中指定为对象。All properties in the current instance of the class will be replaced by the corresponding properties in the specified object. 若要将样式属性复制而无需替换任何设置的值，请使用方法。To copy style properties without replacing any set values, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void FillStyleAttributes (System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection attributes, System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService urlResolver);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void FillStyleAttributes(class System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection attributes, class System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService urlResolver) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub FillStyleAttributes (attributes As CssStyleCollection, urlResolver As IUrlResolutionService)
protected: override void FillStyleAttributes(System::Web::UI::CssStyleCollection ^ attributes, System::Web::UI::IUrlResolutionService ^ urlResolver);

param.name: attributes
param.span: 向其中添加样式属性的 对象。

span.span: The object to which to add the style properties.

param.name: urlResolver
param.span: 一个实现了 的对象，它包含当前位置 (URL) 的上下文信息。

span.span: The -implemented object that contains the context information for the current location (URL).

summary.span: 将 对象的样式属性添加到指定的 对象中。

span.span: Adds the style properties of the object to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法中添加的当前实例的样式属性到指定的类对象。Use the method to add the style properties of the current instance of the class to the specified object. > [!NOTE] > 仅由控件开发人员使用此方法。This method is used only by control developers.

member this.HorizontalPadding : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置子菜单左侧和右侧的空间量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space to the left and right of a submenu.

value.span: 子菜单文本左侧和右侧的空间量。

span.span: The amount of space to the left and right of the text of a submenu.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制子菜单项的文本和包含菜单的边之间的空间量。Use the property to control the amount of space between the text of the submenu item and the side of the containing menu. 若要控制子菜单项之间的垂直空间，使用属性。To control the vertical space between submenu items, use the property.

span.span: The selected value is of or is less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void MergeWith(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style s) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub MergeWith (s As Style)

param.name: s
param.span: 与设置组合在一起的 对象。

span.span: The object to combine settings with.

summary.span: 将指定的 对象的样式属性与 类的当前实例的样式属性组合在一起。

span.span: Combines the style properties of the specified object with those of the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法指定的样式属性组合在一起对象的样式属性从中调用此方法的对象。Use the method to combine the style properties of the specified object with the style properties of the object that this method is called from. > [!CAUTION] > 此方法通过设置每个属性的未设置在当前加入的样式属性对象中指定其相应的值与对象。This method joins the style properties by setting each property that is not set in the current object with its corresponding value in the specified object. 将更新尚未设置的属性。Only properties that have not been set will be updated. 如果在指定的属性对象未设置，在当前的相应属性对象不会更改。If a property in the specified object is not set, the corresponding property in the current object does not change.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 将 类的当前实例返回到其原始状态。

span.span: Returns the current instance of the class to its original state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来删除任何已定义的样式元素，从状态袋和重置到其原始状态的对象。Use the method to remove any defined style elements from the state bag and reset the object to its original state.

summary.span: 获取或设置子菜单上方和下方的空间量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space above and below a submenu.

value.span: 子菜单上方和下方的空间量。

span.span: The amount of space above and below a submenu.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制之间的子菜单项文本的垂直间隔量。Use the property to control the amount of vertical space between the text of submenu items. 若要控制子菜单文本周围的水平空间，使用属性。To control the horizontal space around submenu text, use the property.

span.span: The selected value is of or is less than 0.
